articles.title: From Manila to Seoul, Citigroup ends an era of pan-Asian retail banking - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: US lender will prioritize Hong Kong and Singapore wealth management
articles.content:
HONG KONG -- Citigroup's decision to sell most of its Asian retail business after more than a century of operations marks an end of an era for several markets.
